title: Automated Documentation & Knowledge Synchronization System
abstract: Proposal for an automated system to generate, update, and synchronize technical documentation and governance knowledge across the HiveLLM ecosystem, reducing manual effort and ensuring consistency.
motivation: Current documentation processes are manual, error-prone, and frequently outdated, leading to knowledge gaps between models, governance drift between implementations and specs, and redundant onboarding efforts.
rationale: Automating documentation aligns with project scalability goals, complements existing BIP automation systems, and addresses audit requirements from BIP-04. By implementing automated knowledge management, we ensure consistent and up-to-date information across the entire ecosystem.
specification: Implementation of automated documentation generation from code and governance data, knowledge synchronization across all governance components, comprehensive governance information architecture, automated knowledge updates and consistency checking, and documentation system integration with dashboard and feedback systems.

implementation.overview: Knowledge management system integrated into unified governance platform

tasks: Implement automated documentation generation from code and governance data
Set up knowledge synchronization across all governance components
Deploy automated knowledge updates and consistency checking
Integrate documentation system with dashboard and feedback systems

successCriteria: Complete knowledge synchronization across all governance systems
Automated documentation generation reducing manual effort by 80%

benefits: Automated documentation generation reducing manual maintenance overhead
Knowledge consistency across all governance components and systems
Reduced onboarding effort through comprehensive knowledge management
challenges: Integration complexity with diverse documentation sources
Knowledge extraction accuracy from code and governance data
Performance impact of continuous documentation updates
nextSteps: Integration as knowledge layer in Governance Platform
Coordinate with dashboard and feedback systems
Design documentation APIs and knowledge architecture
